resources.string: Welcome to DailyBoost - Build Healthy Habits!
Stay on track by adding, editing, and completing your daily habits with progress tracking!
Good vibes, keep going - Track Your Moods!
Log your emotions with emojis and notes, and reflect on your mental well-being Celebrate your peace.
Stay Hydrated - Track Your Water Intake!
Receive smart reminders to drink water Set daily goals, log your water, and keep your body refreshed.
